content: Center Selection Algorithm   In the k-means algorithm, we can start with (i) using an initial partition {S1, S2, ..., Sk} or with (ii) using initial centers {c1, c2, ..., ck}. Design a good initialization method for k-means algorithm for (i) and also for (ii)  题目相当于问k-means方法的初始化。常规的来说有三种方法，第一种随机选择初始点，第二种k-means++，第三种基于层次的初始化。
title: Center Selection Algorithm
